name: Mero Technologies Inc.
description: Developer of a cloud-based platform designed to give predictive insights to cleaners and property managers. The company's platform uses smart sensor technology to provide a real-time view of a building's usage trends and inventory supply levels, property managers to dispatch cleaning teams to high-priority areas on an intelligent just-in-time basis, enabling clients to optimize the way buildings perform day-to-day cleaning maintenance.
